footer.about_text: We’re always in search for talented and motivated people. Feel free to introduce yourself!

intro_section.title1: Discover the power of IoT adapted to your projects
intro_section.description1: The use cases presented here are just a glimpse of the infinite possibilities offered by IoT technology.
intro_section.title2: Discover the power of IoT adapted to your projects
intro_section.description2: The use cases presented here are just a glimpse of the infinite possibilities offered by IoT technology.
intro_section.description3: Every detail counts. That's why we work with you to select the ideal connectivity options, ensuring optimal performance for your unique requirements.

device_management_section.subtitle: Work process
device_management_section.title: DEVICE & CONNECTIVITY MANAGEMENT
device_management_section.description: A unified 360° view of your connected object fleet

feature1.title: Open
feature1.description: Aggregate data from your connected objects with third-party data whether IoT or not.

feature2.title: Interoperable
feature2.description: Route your data to a data management business application.

feature3.title: Scalable
feature3.description: Evolve the solution according to your needs and IoT ecosystem.

feature4.title: Secure
feature4.description: Secure and ensure end-to-end data confidentiality.

data_visualisation_section.subtitle: Work process
data_visualisation_section.title: DATA VISUALISATION
data_visualisation_section.description: Managing your activity with complete autonomy

feature1.title: Powerful
feature1.description: Benefit from a 360° view integrating all your IoT data including those from third-party flows.

feature2.title: Simple
feature2.description: Easily configure your reports with rights management and personalized alerts, without any technical knowledge.

feature3.title: Customizable
feature3.description: Enrich your analyses through integration of heterogeneous data regardless of the number of objects and data volume.

feature4.title: Secure
feature4.description: Benefit from a 100% secure infrastructure that guarantees confidentiality of your data with efficient access rights management.

other_cases_section.title: OTHER USE CASES TO EXPLORE...
other_cases_section.subtitle: Yes, I have a specific project!
other_cases_section.cta_button: I would like to be contacted

solution_section.title: A simple, complete and economical solution!
solution_section.description: Our starter kit provides you with an "all inclusive" packaged solution, including the sensor that corresponds to your use, suitable connectivity as well as platforms for supervision and visualization of collected data. The objective is to offer you a turnkey solution, simple to implement and at low cost.

contact_section.title: Can't find the use cases that interest you?

fishflow.title: FishFlow
fishflow.description: Multi-equipment and multi-network supervision platform, dedicated to agricultural and aquaculture environments.

miot.title: M-IoT
miot.description: All-in-one platform for multi-object management and visualization and connectivity in industrial environments

sirgps.title: SirGPS
sirgps.description: The SirGPS web and mobile application is the GPS fleet management tool, to promote cost reduction.

hosting.title: Choose the hosting mode according to your usage
hosting.description1: Two hosting modes are available with our software suite:
hosting.description2: you can choose between shared hosting (SaaS mode) or dedicated hosting (On Premise mode).

saas.title: SaaS solutions: subscription payment?
saas.content0: SaaS architecture allows software solutions to be used online, everywhere and at any time, from a browser.
saas.content2: The software is relocated and accessible remotely via network, through a subscription with the publisher/host, on any browser.
saas.content4: - Maintenance and updates provided by the service provider
saas.content7: - Data protection depends on the provider

on_premise.title: On-premise solutions: license purchase
on_premise.content0: On-premise solutions are software whose architecture is physically present within a company.
on_premise.content2: - The software is installed on the company's servers, which must first purchase a license from the publisher to use the software in question.
on_premise.content4: - Maintenance and updates depend on the internal IT department

expertise.title: Remarkable expertise at the service of your project!

platform.title: An IoT platform adapted to business profiles

dashboards.title: Customizable dashboards
dashboards.description: Hardware and M2M SIM card integration

support.title: We support you throughout your project
support.description: As a publisher, connectivity is at the heart of our business, in our offers as well as in the platforms we design. In order to provide a solution and service that is both global and unique, we integrate the objects designed by our manufacturing partners directly into our intelligent platforms.
support.mission_description: Support you throughout the IoT value chain to guarantee the success of your project.
support.concrete_description: Tell us about your project and together we will identify a use case, from which the solution made for you will emerge.
support.process_description: From choosing objects to exploiting your data, including choosing connectivity, our role is to build with you a project that resembles you. Our experts have written, just for you, a connectivity guide to accompany you during step #2: connect your objects!
